scripts.build:dev: webpack --config webpack.dev.js && npm run --silent make_runtime_dirs && npm run --silent finished
scripts.build:prod: webpack --config webpack.prod.js && npm run --silent make_runtime_dirs && npm run --silent finished
scripts.build:release: webpack --config webpack.prod.js --env.release && npm run --silent copy_frontend && npm run --silent finished
scripts.build: func() { [ -z "$1" ] && mode='dev' || mode="$1"; npm run --silent clean && npm run --silent build:back "$mode" && npm run --silent generate_schema && npm run --silent build:front "$mode"; }; func
scripts.build:front: func() { [ -z "$1" ] && mode='dev' || mode="$1"; npm run --silent --prefix 'frontend/' build "$mode"; }; func
scripts.build:back: func() { [ -z "$1" ] && mode='dev' || mode="$1"; npm run --silent clean && npm run --silent build:"$mode"; }; func
scripts.start:devServer: echo 'Starting frontend development server:' && npm run --prefix frontend/ start
scripts.start:apiOnly:
echo -e 'Starting backend server (API only):
' && node build/go-music --api-only
